notes: Session 3 complete: Implemented FR-006 (group chat context) and FR-007 (REPL prompt format). Changes: (1) Added GroupID and ProfileGetter fields to repl.Config, (2) Updated context building to use ChatTypeGroup when GroupID is set with SourceID=GroupID, (3) Added buildPrompt() function to display DisplayName(user-id)> or (user-id)> based on profile lookup, (4) Created UserProfile and ProfileGetter interfaces for profile display name lookup. Tests added for AC-005 (group chat context), AC-006/AC-006b (prompt format with/without profile), and backward compatibility. All preflight checks pass. Next session should focus on FR-008/FR-009 (/switch and /users REPL commands) or FR-010-FR-012 (/invite command).
